main event: A Cessna 172 aircraft with an electrical advertising sign was observed in the Dayton, Ohio area on June 22, 1968.
interesting points: The plane was visible from up to 15 miles away and was advertising for Sterling Fuel of Middleburg.
The sign on the plane was a normal light-reflecting from the leading edge of the wing.
There were no other unidentified aerial objects operating in the Dayton, West Carrollton, and Kettering areas on the night of June 22, 1968.
The sighting was initially reported as a potential UFO, but was later identified as the advertising plane.
The plane was operating in the area for advertising purposes and returned to its base of operation.
sighted object: Cessna 172 aircraft with electrical advertising sign
